overview:
Carl is co-founder for Secure BI, a company which is focused on providing better tools for SAP Security implementation and management.

Carl has also been an SAP Security Consultant for 13 years, the last 5 of which have been primarily focused on SAP BW/BI and SAP HR Security Consulting.

Carl graduated with a liberal arts degree from a small university in Canada. After 5 years of Asian work/travel, and starting a small business in Vancouver Canada, he started SAP Security consulting in Tokyo. SAP Security consulting has afforded led to contract work with many widely recognized companies on-site in Canada and the US, Europe, South Africa and Australia . Working mostly as an independent contractor Carl has accumulated implementation experience in many SAP modules, he is an SAP Certified BW Solutions Consultant.
